Medicaid Agency Name: Alabama Medicaid Agency
Mailing Address: 501 Dexter Avenue, P.O. Box 5624, Montgomery, AL 36103-5624
How to Submit Requests: Complete Public Records Request Form and submit electronically to public.records@medicaid.alabama.gov
Legal Considerations & Notes: Fees may be required before fulfillment. Must be specific in request.

Medicaid Agency Name: Alaska Department of Health - Division of Health Care Services
Mailing Address: 4601 Business Park Blvd., Bldg. K, Anchorage, AK 99503-7167
How to Submit Requests: Contact agency directly; follow Alaska public records procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Alaska allows 10 days to respond to public records requests.

Medicaid Agency Name: Arizona Health Care Cost Containment System (AHCCCS)
How to Submit Requests: Written request to agency; follow Arizona Public Records Act
Legal Considerations & Notes: No specific timeline mandated, must be prompt.

Medicaid Agency Name: Arkansas Department of Human Services - Division of Medical Services
Mailing Address: Donaghey Plaza, P.O. Box 1437, Little Rock, AR 72203
How to Submit Requests: In person, phone, mail, fax, or email. Submit FOIA request online.
Legal Considerations & Notes: Only Arkansas citizens can make FOIA requests. 3 business day response.

Medicaid Agency Name: California Department of Health Care Services (DHCS) - Medi-Cal
How to Submit Requests: Follow California Public Records Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Can extend to 14 days with written notice for unusual circumstances.

Medicaid Agency Name: Colorado Department of Health Care Policy & Financing - Health First Colorado
How to Submit Requests: Written request via mail, email, fax, or CORA portal
Legal Considerations & Notes: Colorado Open Records Act. 3 business days, may extend to 7.

Medicaid Agency Name: Connecticut Department of Social Services - HUSKY Health
How to Submit Requests: Submit via GovQA portal or contact DSS Communications
Legal Considerations & Notes: Connecticut FOIA Commission: (860) 566-5682, foi@ct.gov

Medicaid Agency Name: Delaware Department of Health and Social Services - Division of Medicaid & Medical Assistance
Mailing Address: 1901 North Dupont Highway, New Castle, DE 19720
How to Submit Requests: Online FOIA form, email, fax, or US mail. Must be in writing.
Legal Considerations & Notes: Must be Delaware resident. Out-of-state requests considered case-by-case.

Medicaid Agency Name: DC Department of Health Care Finance
How to Submit Requests: Written FOIA request to FOIA officer
Legal Considerations & Notes: DC follows Freedom of Information Act procedures.

Medicaid Agency Name: Florida Agency for Health Care Administration
How to Submit Requests: Written request to agency
Legal Considerations & Notes: Florida Sunshine Law - no specific deadline mandated.

Medicaid Agency Name: Georgia Department of Community Health - Medicaid
Mailing Address: 2 Martin Luther King Jr. Drive SE, East Tower, Atlanta, GA 30334
Email Address: Check DCH website for specific divisions
How to Submit Requests: Fill out online form or contact General Counsel Open Records
Legal Considerations & Notes: Georgia Open Records Act. 3 business days to respond.

Medicaid Agency Name: Hawaii Department of Human Services - Med-QUEST Division
How to Submit Requests: UIPA request via email to dhs@dhs.hawaii.gov
Legal Considerations & Notes: Hawaii Uniform Information Practices Act (UIPA). 10 business days.

Medicaid Agency Name: Idaho Department of Health and Welfare - Division of Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Online public record request form or contact Transparency Team
Legal Considerations & Notes: Idaho Public Records Act. Response within 10 days.

Medicaid Agency Name: Illinois Department of Healthcare and Family Services
Mailing Address: 201 S. Grand Ave. E., 3rd Floor, Springfield, IL 62763
How to Submit Requests: Written request by fax, US mail, or email
Legal Considerations & Notes: Illinois FOIA. 5 business days, can extend 5 more days. Commercial requests: 21 days.

Medicaid Agency Name: Indiana Family and Social Services Administration - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Indiana Access to Public Records Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Indiana APRA. Reasonable amount of time, typically 7 days.

Medicaid Agency Name: Iowa Department of Health and Human Services - Iowa Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Iowa Open Records Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Iowa allows up to 20 calendar days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: Kansas Department for Aging and Disability Services - KanCare
How to Submit Requests: Submit Open Records Request Form via email or mail
Legal Considerations & Notes: Kansas Open Records Act. 3 business days. Fee schedule applies.

Medicaid Agency Name: Kentucky Department for Medicaid Services
How to Submit Requests: Follow Kentucky Open Records Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Kentucky allows up to 5 days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: Louisiana Department of Health - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Louisiana Public Records Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Louisiana allows 3 days to respond.

Medicaid Agency Name: Maine Department of Health and Human Services - MaineCare
How to Submit Requests: Follow Maine Freedom of Access Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Maine Freedom of Access Act. 5 days to acknowledge, fees may apply.

Medicaid Agency Name: Maryland Department of Health - Medical Assistance
How to Submit Requests: Follow Maryland Public Information Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Maryland PIA allows up to 30 days - longest in the nation.

Medicaid Agency Name: Massachusetts Executive Office of Health and Human Services - MassHealth
How to Submit Requests: Follow Massachusetts Public Records Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Massachusetts allows 10 days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: Michigan Department of Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Submit via My Records Center or mail/fax to FOIA Coordinator
Legal Considerations & Notes: Michigan FOIA. No specific timeline, must be prompt. Fees may apply.

Medicaid Agency Name: Minnesota Department of Human Services - Medical Assistance
How to Submit Requests: Follow Minnesota Data Practices Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Minnesota Data Practices Act. Reasonable response time, not specified.

Medicaid Agency Name: Mississippi Division of Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Submit public records request via online form
Legal Considerations & Notes: Mississippi allows 7 days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: Missouri Department of Social Services - MO HealthNet
How to Submit Requests: Follow Missouri Sunshine Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Missouri Sunshine Law. 3 business days to respond.

Medicaid Agency Name: Montana Department of Public Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Montana public records procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Montana has no mandated response time.

Medicaid Agency Name: Nebraska Department of Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Nebraska public records procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Nebraska allows 4 days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: Nevada Department of Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Nevada public records procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Nevada allows 5 days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: New Hampshire Department of Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow New Hampshire Right to Know Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: NH Right to Know Law. 5 business days. Fees cannot be waived.

Medicaid Agency Name: New Jersey Department of Human Services - NJ FamilyCare
How to Submit Requests: Follow New Jersey OPRA procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Must be NJ resident. Open Public Records Act. 7 business days.

Medicaid Agency Name: New Mexico Human Services Department - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act
Legal Considerations & Notes: NM IPRA allows 15 days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: New York State Department of Health - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow New York Freedom of Information Law (FOIL)
Legal Considerations & Notes: NY FOIL requires response within 5 business days.

Medicaid Agency Name: North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services - NC Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow NC Public Records Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: North Carolina has no mandated response time.

Medicaid Agency Name: North Dakota Department of Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow North Dakota Open Records Statute
Legal Considerations & Notes: North Dakota has no mandated response time.

Medicaid Agency Name: Ohio Department of Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Ohio Public Records Law (Sunshine Law)
Legal Considerations & Notes: Ohio Sunshine Law. No specific timeline, must be prompt.

Medicaid Agency Name: Oklahoma Health Care Authority - SoonerCare
Mailing Address: 4345 N. Lincoln Blvd, Oklahoma City, OK 73105
Email Address: Via online open records request form
How to Submit Requests: Submit Open Records Request Form online
Legal Considerations & Notes: Oklahoma Open Records Act. No specific timeline. Fee may apply.

Medicaid Agency Name: Oregon Health Authority - Oregon Health Plan
How to Submit Requests: Follow Oregon Public Records Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Oregon requires prompt response, no specific timeline.

Medicaid Agency Name: Pennsylvania Department of Human Services - Medical Assistance
How to Submit Requests: Follow Pennsylvania Right to Know Law
Legal Considerations & Notes: PA Right to Know Law. 5 business days to respond.

Medicaid Agency Name: Rhode Island Executive Office of Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Rhode Island Access to Public Records Act
Legal Considerations & Notes: RI APRA. 10 business days, can extend additional 20 for good cause.

Medicaid Agency Name: South Carolina Department of Health and Human Services
Mailing Address: P.O. Box 8206, Columbia, SC 29202 / 1801 Main Street, Columbia, SC
How to Submit Requests: SCDHHS Medicaid FOIA Portal (preferred), email, fax, mail, or hand delivery
Legal Considerations & Notes: SC FOIA. 10 days for recent records, 15 days for older records. Fees apply.

Medicaid Agency Name: South Dakota Department of Social Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow South Dakota Sunshine Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: SD Sunshine Law. Response within 15 days.

Medicaid Agency Name: Tennessee Department of Finance and Administration - TennCare
How to Submit Requests: Follow Tennessee Public Records Act. Must be TN resident.
Legal Considerations & Notes: Must be Tennessee resident. 7 business days to respond.

Medicaid Agency Name: Texas Health and Human Services Commission - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Texas Public Information Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Texas PIA allows 10 business days for response.

Medicaid Agency Name: Utah Department of Health and Human Services - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow Utah Government Records Access and Management Act
Legal Considerations & Notes: Utah GRAMA allows 10 business days. Fees apply after 15 minutes.

Medicaid Agency Name: Vermont Department of Vermont Health Access - Green Mountain Care
How to Submit Requests: Follow Vermont Public Records Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Vermont has shortest response time: 2-3 business days.

Medicaid Agency Name: Virginia Department of Medical Assistance Services
How to Submit Requests: Written FOIA request. Must be Virginia resident.
Legal Considerations & Notes: Must be VA resident. Virginia FOIA: 5 days, extendable to 12. Fines up to $2,500.

Medicaid Agency Name: Washington Health Care Authority - Apple Health
How to Submit Requests: Follow Washington Public Records Act procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Washington requires prompt response, typically 5 days.

Medicaid Agency Name: West Virginia Department of Health and Human Resources - Medicaid
How to Submit Requests: Follow West Virginia FOIA procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: WV FOIA requires response within 5 business days. Fines up to $1,000.

Medicaid Agency Name: Wisconsin Department of Health Services - ForwardHealth
How to Submit Requests: Follow Wisconsin Public Records Law procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Wisconsin requires prompt response, no specific timeline.

Medicaid Agency Name: Wyoming Department of Health - Healthcare Financing Division
How to Submit Requests: Follow Wyoming public records procedures
Legal Considerations & Notes: Wyoming Sunshine Law. No specific deadline, up to 30 days typical.

Medicaid Agency Name: Puerto Rico Health Insurance Administration (ASES)
Mailing Address: Check ASES website / CMS Region 2: 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278
How to Submit Requests: May need to contact CMS under federal FOIA
Legal Considerations & Notes: Territories have capped federal Medicaid funding. Contact CMS for federal records.

Medicaid Agency Name: USVI Department of Health - Medicaid
Mailing Address: CMS Region 2: 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278
How to Submit Requests: Contact CMS under federal FOIA for federal records
Legal Considerations & Notes: Territory Medicaid programs differ from states. 83% FMAP permanent through 2023 CAA.

Medicaid Agency Name: Guam Department of Public Health and Social Services - Medicaid
Mailing Address: CMS Region 9: 90 7th Street, Suite 5-300, San Francisco, CA 94103
How to Submit Requests: Contact CMS under federal FOIA for federal records
Legal Considerations & Notes: Territory with capped federal funding. 83% FMAP permanent.

Medicaid Agency Name: American Samoa Medicaid State Agency
Mailing Address: CMS Region 9: 90 7th Street, Suite 5-300, San Francisco, CA 94103
How to Submit Requests: Contact CMS under federal FOIA for federal records
Legal Considerations & Notes: Territory operates under waiver. 83% FMAP permanent. Limited services.

Medicaid Agency Name: CNMI Medicaid Program
Mailing Address: CMS Region 9: 90 7th Street, Suite 5-300, San Francisco, CA 94103
How to Submit Requests: Contact CMS under federal FOIA for federal records
Legal Considerations & Notes: Territory operates under waiver. 83% FMAP permanent. Capped funding.
